generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Several buildings are visible in the background, including a multi-story building with windows and commercial signage.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the sides of the road and in front of the buildings.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalk and between the road and trees.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a blue car in the foreground and several others in the distance.
- truck: A white van (truck) is visible parked on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, with one showing red and another showing green.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the gaps in the tree canopy.
